description:
SimpleX - the first messaging network operating without user identifiers of any kind - 100% private by design! iOS,
Android and desktop apps ðŸ“±!

Unlike any other existing messaging platform, SimpleX has no identifiers assigned to the users - it does not use phone
numbers (like Signal or WhatsApp), domain-based addresses (like email, XMPP or Matrix), usernames (like Telegram),
public keys or even random numbers (like all other messengers) to identify its users - we do not even know how many
people use SimpleX.
New in v6.4.6:
- fixed opening SimpleX links from outside of the app.
Commits:
- flatpak: update metainfo (#6257)
- ci: update libffi to 3.5.2 in Mac build (#6258)
- cli: option to disable backup or change backup directory on migration (#6267)
- core: update simplexmq
- ios: fix showing connection alert when fresh app is opened via link (before onboarding) (#6332)
- android: fix showing connection alert when app is opened via link (#6333)
- core: 6.4.6.0 (simplexmq 6.4.6.0)
- 6.4.6: ios 299, android 321, desktop 121
- android, desktop: update dependency
